document.full_text: euro zone finance ministers are likely to back a bailout package for portugal on monday, with new conditions set by finland, in talks overshadowed by charges against imf chief dominique strauss-kahn for attempted rape.
document.title: euro zone to back portugal aid, with new caveats
lines_and_colors: euro zone finance ministers are likely to back a bailout package for portugal on monday, with new conditions set by finland, in talks overshadowed by charges against imf chief dominique strauss-kahn for attempted rape.
